name: stjude_manta
title: Manta
summary: DNAnexus implementation of Illumina's Manta structural variation caller (https://github.com/Illumina/manta)

inputSpec.name: normal_bam_index
inputSpec.label: Normal BAM index
inputSpec.help: Normal BAM index file(s). If not provided, index will be generated.

inputSpec.name: tumor_bam
inputSpec.label: Tumor BAM
inputSpec.help: Tumor BAM file. If provided, only one normal BAM will be used.

inputSpec.name: tumor_bam_index
inputSpec.label: Tumor BAM Index
inputSpec.help: Tumor BAM index file. If not provided, index will be generated.

inputSpec.name: reference_fasta_index
inputSpec.label: Reference FASTA Index
inputSpec.help: Reference FASTA file index. If not provided, index will be generated.

inputSpec.name: output_contig
inputSpec.label: Output Contig
inputSpec.help: Flag for outputContig option. Default is true. Will output assembled contig sequences for the variant in the final VCF file.

inputSpec.name: call_regions
inputSpec.label: Call Regions
inputSpec.help: Flag for callRegions option. Should only be used for GRCh38 samples. Restricts structural variant calling to the canonical chromosomes.

inputSpec.name: output_prefix
inputSpec.label: Output Prefix
inputSpec.help: Prefix to add to the output files.

outputSpec.name: variant_outputs
outputSpec.label: Variant Outputs
outputSpec.help: All files in the variants output folder.

outputSpec.name: statistics_outputs
outputSpec.label: Statistics Outputs
outputSpec.help: All files in the statistics output folder.
